Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' following 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts entering 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' after 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all manuscripts reviewed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of times 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' leads to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' leading to 'SW-EIC Major Revision' compared to 'SW-EIC Minor Revision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' in the most common process variant
Average time from 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' to final decision ('SW-EIC Accept', 'SW-EIC Major Revision', 'SW-EIC Minor Revision', 'SW-EIC Reject')
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' followed by 'SW-EIC Reject' out of all decisions made
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' as a bottleneck point leading to delays in the review process
Ratio of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' followed by 'SW-EIC Major Revision' over 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' followed by 'SW-EIC Minor Revision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' leading to 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' indicating acceptance and progression to production
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' that occur after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2', indicating prolonged review cycles
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' in manuscripts with 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' indicating a completed review process
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurrences that result in a decision within 30 days
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' leading directly to 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit', indicating a chance for resubmission after major revisions
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurrences per month
